channel.description: Recent content in DigitalPractice on Alden's Blog Home

item.title: Make a Digital Public Space
item.description: Inspired by the near extinct website guestbook and completely extinct methods of phone phreaking, I wanted to make something that felt as unfinished and wide open with potential as the “old” web of 1992 – 2001. Please participate: https://tinyurl.com/y7tvrusf Communication between users in this space is possible but only through “hacks” of the intended use. There is no security and everything can be seen.
